summary: A biker returns from Thailand to set things straight with his girlfriend. One gang leader wants him for delivery of 2 motorbikes filled with crystal meth and another gang leader wants him for murdering his brother.
cast: John Ashker|Max Beesley|Dane Cook|Ice Cube|John Doe|Gichi Gamba|Lance Gilbert|Martin Henderson|Jay Hernandez|Will Yun Lee|Faizon Love|Justina Machado|Monet Mazur|Hayden McFarland|Christina Milian|Kinga Philipps|Jaime Pressly|Nichole Galicia|Matt Schulze|Harry Anthony Shelley|Adam Scott|Tina Shelley|Fredro Starr|Eddie Steeples|Scott Waugh|Tony Wilde|Jim Cody Williams|Jerry Winsett|Erik Betts|John Eric Brown|Josh Cruze|Jennifer Elizabeth|Adam Harrington|Jesse James|Joseph Kahn|Jacob Lavin|Lill Micke|Monster Magnet|Rana Morrison|Ed Mundell|Matt Murdock|Lene Pedersen|Nahisha Pettit|Timothy Prindle|Rachelle Roderick|Deidra Sarego|Rodney Wilson|Jennifer Wolfson|Zakk Wylde|David Wyndorf
title: Torque: Rodando al límite
